articles.description: OnePlus has decided to launch another smartphone under the Nord series- OnePlus Nord 3. You can check the specs, features, and design below.
articles.content: OnePlus is expected to launch the OnePlus Nord 3 soon in India and the smartphone has been spotted on the official website of the company. Tipster Mukul Sharma shared the screenshot of the website wi… [+519 chars]
